scripts.testNode: babel TestJS.js --out-file Test.js && node Test.js && rm Test.js
scripts.run-android-staging: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && react-native run-android --variant=staging
scripts.build-android-staging: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStaging
scripts.android-bundling: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.code-push-android-staging: code-push release-react example-android android --t 0.0.1 --des “我是更新信息
scripts.code-push-ios-staging: code-push release-react example-ios ios --t 0.0.1 --des “我是更新信息
scripts.code-push-android-release: code-push release-react example-android android --t 0.0.1 --d Production --des “我是更新信息
scripts.code-push-ios-release: code-push release-react example-ios ios --t 0.0.1 --d Production --des “我是更新信息
